name: sheerwater-mcp
description: Weather forecast benchmarking and comparison tools - evaluate and compare forecast models against ground truth datasets
long_description: Sheerwater MCP provides access to weather forecast benchmarking capabilities for LLMs. Compare forecast models (ECMWF, GFS, AI models like FuXi, Pangu) against ground truth datasets using metrics like MAE, RMSE, bias, and anomaly correlation. Generate comparison charts and link to interactive Grafana dashboards.

tools.name: tool_list_forecasts
tools.description: List available forecast models for benchmarking

tools.name: tool_get_metric_info
tools.description: Get detailed explanation of a specific metric

tools.name: tool_run_metric
tools.description: Run a single evaluation metric comparing forecast to truth

tools.name: tool_compare_models
tools.description: Compare multiple forecast models on a metric

tools.name: tool_estimate_query_time
tools.description: Estimate how long a query will take

tools.name: tool_get_dashboard_link
tools.description: Get a Grafana dashboard URL for detailed exploration
